description.narrative:
Denmark’s support for Development Initiatives’ Global Humanitarian Assistance Programme contributes to the objective of informing decisions and promoting positive change on how resources are and could be allocated and used to most effectively meet the needs of those vulnerable to and affected by humanitarian crises.
Supporting Development Initiatives’ Global Humanitarian Assistance Programme in its work to inform decisions and promote positive change in the way that resources are and could be allocated and used to most effectively meet the needs of those vulnerable to and affected by humanitarian crises.
The partner’s results description and results frameworks are global, general, and highly aggregated and the MFA core contribution is thus reflected in the overall results reporting by the partner. Please refer to the hyperlink below.
https://devinit.org/resources/?nav=header

Supporting Development Initiatives’ Global Humanitarian Assistance Programme in its work to inform decisions and promote positive change in the way that resources are and could be allocated and used to most effectively meet the needs of those vulnerable to and affected by humanitarian crises
